abstract: Aruba officials are investigating what caused crash of small civilian aircraft near island; it is unclear whether Venezuelan military jets that had been following plane, which was believed to be carrying drugs, was responsible.
lead_paragraph: A small civilian aircraft, suspected of carrying drugs and pursued by Venezuelan military jets, crashed Thursday into the Caribbean Sea near the island of Aruba, officials said.
snippet: A small civilian aircraft, suspected of carrying drugs and pursued by Venezuelan military jets, crashed Thursday into the Caribbean Sea near the island of Aruba, officials said.

headline.main: Plane Crashes Near Aruba After Pursuit by Military Jets
headline.print_headline: Plane Crashes Near Aruba After Pursuit by Military Jets
